Package codes.ollieg.magicmotd

Class ConfigLoader

java.lang.Object
codes.ollieg.magicmotd.ConfigLoader
public class ConfigLoader extends Object
Responsible for loading and parsing the YAML config file.

      Returns:

    • validateTemplates

      public boolean validateTemplates(@NotNull @NotNull String message)
      Checks all templates in the message for validity.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to check
      Returns:
      true if all templates are valid, false otherwise
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the message is null

    • substituteTemplates

      public String substituteTemplates(@NotNull @NotNull String message, @NotNull @NotNull String player_name, int online_players, int max_players)
      Substitutes all templates in the message with the given values.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to substitute
      player_name - The player name
      online_players - The number of online players
      max_players - The maximum number of players
      Returns:
      The substituted message

    • parseConfig

      public void parseConfig()
      Parses the config for use by the plugin.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the config is invalid

    • isParsed

      public boolean isParsed()
      Checks if the config has been parsed yet.
